nodes.text: Graak was a cunning Ewok warrior from Bright Tree Village.
He was also aggressive and militaristic. He had gray and black fur and black eyes.
Graak was part of the hunting party that captured Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Chewbacca, C-3PO, and R2-D2.
An action figure based on Graak was released in 2007. However, the coloring more closely resembles Lumat.
In the film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, Graak was portrayed by actor Daniel Rodgers.[source?]

Both the Decipher CCG and The Official Star Wars Fact Files identified a single Ewok as Graak. However, later sources including The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia and the Star Wars: 30th Anniversary Collection identify a similar Ewok as Graak.
